2025-03-24.title: Tencent upgrades AI model to compete with DeepSeek, Alibaba
2025-03-24.description: A team of Tencent engineers claimed in an event streamed online that the new model has cutting-edge logic and writing capabilities, with few hallucinations or distortions

2025-03-28.title: Assassin's Creed-maker Ubisoft gets $1.25bn investment from Chinese tech giant Tencent
2025-03-28.description: Shenzhen-based Tencent, which owns the popular messaging app WeChat, will hold about a quarter of a new subsidiary.
